title: Hi I'm Humza! Here's my journey :)
content:
Hi there,


I'm Humza, I recently started a course that is training me up to become a full stack web developer.

It's a really big change from what i'm used to, coming from an engineering background, but i'm loving the experience so far.


I've learnt a lot already, and love the design aspect of coding.

Btw does any one have any resources on testing?? I'm super lost on it!


Humza
comments: Check out the Jest documentation, there's some good stuff there!

title: Any gamers about?

title: How to write a function in JavaScript
content:
An few examples of functions in JavaScript


Standard:

function sayHi(){
  console.log("hi")
}

Arrow:

const sayHi = () => console.log("hi")

title: Help!! How do you break out of a for loop in JS?
content:
Hey all,

I am seriously stuck as per usual and need to work out how to break out of a for loop like the one below: 

for (let i=0; i<10; i++){
  console.log(i)
}

Any help would be much appreciated!

Fairwell my fellow coding pals!!
comments: I literally have no idea - you're welcome
You can use the break statement to end the for loop early

title: Coffee and coding
content:
Won't even look at vs code without a coffee


I love coffee and I love programming! Here's an article I came across for any other coffee loving programmers like myself:

https://nerdlettering.com/blogs/articles/why-do-programmers-love-coffee

title: Coding frustrations..
content:
I love programming but it drives me crazy sometimes! Like when you missed a squiggly bracket somewhere but just can't find the error, and your code editors looking at you like, 'meh' lol. Anyone feel the same?!  


Exception up = new Exception("Something is really wrong.");
throw up;  //ha ha


Happy days!
comments: haha agreed, that gif really sums it up :D
